name: Canadas Game
description: There is nothing quite like a game of hockey during a Canadian winter. Create a pond-hockey league quickly with this hockey registration program that helps get the league up and running.

name: Adopt-A-Pet
description: A website that supports animal lovers as they find and care for a new pet.

name: Finanical Tracker
description: Great for users that are just learning about business and stocks. Users can search for a company, review stock performance and manage a watchlist of stocks. Also includes carousel of NYT Business articles and ticker with metrics on various markets.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Keep track of your daily workouts with this tool built on a mongoose database. A simple program that allow the user to create a workout and monitor progress over time.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Search for the weather in any city around the world. Provides a current and five day forecast. Frequently visited cities can be saved for easy reference.

name: Employee Directory
description: This flexible employee directory allows users to search for employees by name or country.

name: Budget Tracker
description: A fun little tool for tracking financial progress against a budget. Works offline and updates database when internet connection is resumed.

name: Team Builder
description: An inquirer-based tool built entirely in JavaScript that allows an organization to build a team. HTML page of the team is generated as output.
